name: Imperial Computing Access Nation (ICAN)
description1: Imperial Computing Access Nation is a computer club of Imperial College of Engineering. It is an non-profit organization to share and teach computing information skills and techniques. Our prime focus is to keep the enthusiastic students of Imperial College of Engineering updated with the latest technology and connect them with the era of Information Technology at large.  We started our journey on 28th December,  2021 initiated by Fahim Ahammed Firoz, present General Secretary of this club and some co-founders all are from the batch of 1st and 2nd at the department of CSE.
description2: Imperial Computing Access Nation (ICAN) is the one and only Computer club in CSE department of Imperial College of Engineering. The club provides a strong platform for the engineering students to practically implement their innovative ideas in computer for different applications. The Club offers indispensible guidance, workshops and organizes various events for students to explore their full potential
description3: Our Club is an all volunteer Non-for-Profit organization to share and teach computing information, skills and techniques in a congenial atmosphere.Our prime focus is to keep the enthusiastic students of Imperial College  of Engineering updated with the latest technology and connect them with the era of Information Technology at large.

name: Imperial Cultural Club
description1: Imperial Cultural Club (ICC) is a Voluntary organization of Imperial College of Engineering. ICC is responsible for all the cultural events in the Institute around the year. Imperial cultural club strives to bring out the hidden talent of the students of the college. It is the place where students can showcase what they have got. It helps to discover their talent. Cultural events include competitions such as instrumental, singing, dance etc. Every year this club organizes activities such as Talent Hunt, Fresher’s Party, Farewell, Fest and Alumni Meet.

name: Imperial Sports Club
description1: Imperial Sports Club is committed to provide a healthy sporting habit among the students. It helps to learn teamwork at work, coordination among diverse cultural & ethnic groups and mainly infuses discipline & instills the value system in one individual. Value of time, precision & competitiveness are the major learning points apart from communication, coordination & teamwork.

name: Imperial Textile Club
description1: The department’s facilitated with highly qualified, dynamic, dedicated and well experienced faculty members to build the best textile engineering department in Bangladesh. The department started its journey in 2018 with 25 students, designed for the students to acquire sufficient knowledge and understanding the principle and technique of Textile Science and clothing. With the increase of huge demand for skilled manpower in Ready Made Garments (RMG) sector, the aim of the program is to create skilled textile graduates to meet the growing demand for the highest foreign currency earning sector of Bangladesh.”
